侯.definition: used in 閩侯|闽侯[Min3hou4] (the name of a place in Fujian)

侯景之亂.definition: rebellion against Liang of the Southern Dynasties 南朝梁 in 548

侯賽因.definition: Husain or Hussein (name); Hussein (c. 626-680), Muslim leader whose martyrdom is commemorated at Ashura; Saddam Hussein al Tikriti (1937-2006), dictator of Iraq 1979-2003

侯門似海.definition: lit. the gate of a noble house is like the sea (idiom); fig. there is a wide gap between the nobility and the common people

侯馬.definition: Houma, county-level city in Linfen 臨汾|临汾[Lin2 fen2], Shanxi

侯馬市.definition: Houma, county-level city in Linfen 臨汾|临汾[Lin2 fen2], Shanxi
